title: Why do we still play league of legends then ?
body:
because it is still one of the best games nowdays   hate it or love it 
most of games nowdays die after couple of months  of their release , they get so much hype at first and everyone talking about it  then poof no one is talking about the game anymore
yea sure league has it's own cons such as the community and some balance  problems  , but lol was worse  than today in terms of balance  in the past and we still enjoyed playing it 
the only games i consider the best today are  battlefield  lol  WoW ( Legion is actually awesome atleast for me  ) , hearthstone and overwatch
